REVIEW.Name: Staff

RHighlight.p: A pool that starts in your very lounge and extends practically all the way to the sea! What’s not to like? You can literally slide off the couch into the jacuzzi (which is actually half-in, half-out the living area), and onwards into the pool via a plunge pool linking the two. The seaside living/dining area – which can be closed off if the weather isn’t playing nice – is also terribly romantic, and the massive daybeds on the timber deck are hard to peel yourself off once you’re settled in with a good book.

RSurroundArea.p: There is relatively little to disturb you in the area immediately surrounding Majapahit Villas. It is staggeringly peaceful – perfect for those looking for rest and recuperation away from the action. The closest town, Sanur, is 13km away, but it’s good for restaurants and shopping, as is Ubud (17km). Ketewel itself is a quiet village offering little to drag you away from your daybed watching the surf. Unless you’re a surfer yourself that is! This stretch of beach is well known as a surfer’s heaven (especially in East Coast season, which runs from round about November to May, when the winds turn offshore on this side of the island), but beginners should be aware of strong, swirling currents. Alternatively, guests can charter the villas' private boat for a fishing, sightseeing or snorkelling trip, or a romantic sunset cruise, or make use of one of Majapahit’s bicycles to cycle around the local ‘burb, communing with locals and, with any luck, witnessing a ceremony or two at the local temple. The market at Sukawati (7km) is a very popular shopping destination for Bali souvenirs and the Bali Safari and Marine Park, just 7km down the road, is a good whole day out for the kids, with tram rides and a small water park. There is a 9-hole golf course at the Bali Beach Hotel in Sanur. Diving can be arranged in Sanur and horse riding is just up the road.

REVIEW.ROverallComments:
We loved Villa Maya, primarily for location, location, location. Majapahit is wonderfully isolated and private – in fact it can feel like you’re the only person on the island. Combine this with regular doses of fresh sea spray and breezes and it’s a great place for clearing the mind. With this in, well, mind, it’s worth paying that bit extra for the absolute seafront Villas Maya and Samudra. The two garden villas behind (Nataraja and Raj), just don’t offer quite the same location value.
While Majapahit Villas may not be prime position for restaurants and nightlife (with a team of chefs producing gourmet cuisine from Majapahit's professional kitchen, who needs restaurants?), they offer some unique guest benefits, including a private boat for sight-seeing, fishing and snorkelling trips, and Villa Maya has its very own temple which makes a wonderfully Balinese setting for a special ceremony. Some of Bali's best surf beaches (especially during the East Coast Season – November to May) are within an easy drive, as are the fascinating traditional craft villages of Mas, Sukawati, Batubulan and Batuan, as well as Ketewel and Saba which are both renowned for their elegant Legong dance performances.
Aside from location, Villa Maya and co are really just comfortable, ‘liveable’ holiday venues. Let’s call it ‘luxury for beginners’. The staff are genuinely warm and helpful, if a touch over-eager (they tend to hover unless you are quite clear about being left alone); the in-villa chef is quite a dab hand in the kitchen (best spaghetti bolognaise we’ve had on the island to date); and the facilities/amenities are all thought of – including an excellent stock of the latest release DVDs).
It may not be the most swish accommodation on the island, but its understated luxury feels ‘homey’, the type of place that finds you thinking, ‘I could live here.’

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: Remember that romantic, winding staircase we spoke of? Keep in mind it’s surprisingly hard to navigate if you’re (a) a small child (in fact we wouldn’t recommend small children stay here for that very reason) and (b) a tipsy adult (although with the price of wine and being what it is in Bali that hardly need be a consideration). Aside from that, call us fussy but we kind of expect ‘luxury’ villas to have top-notch entertainment systems –at Majapahit they are a bit on the old, and small, side, but then we freely admit we’re suckers for a big screen TV. The kitchen too doesn’t quite match up to the ‘luxury’ label, but then perhaps that’s because you’re not expected to enter it; indeed the staff would be mortified if you took over their jobs in there!

RHighlight.p: No doubt the privacy is a highlight here. You could lock yourself away in your garden and forget the rest of the world. The staff will come and go as required – a small bell is available to summon them. The huge living room opening out to the lawns is also a plus, and having the pool inside the living room is very novel!

RSurroundArea.p: There is relatively little to disturb you in the area immediately surrounding Majapahit Villas. It is staggeringly peaceful – perfect for those looking for rest and recuperation away from the action. The closest town, Sanur, is 13km away, but it’s good for restaurants and shopping, as is Ubud (17km). Ketewel itself is a quiet village offering little to drag you away from your daybed watching the surf. Unless you’re a surfer yourself that is! This stretch of beach is well known as a surfer’s heaven (especially in East Coast season, which runs from round about November to May, when the winds turn offshore on this side of the island), but beginners should be aware of strong, swirling currents. Alternatively, guests can charter the villas' private boat for a fishing, sightseeing or snorkelling trip, or a romantic sunset cruise, or make use of one of Majapahit’s bicycles to cycle around the local ‘burb, communing with locals and, with any luck, witnessing a ceremony or two at the local temple. The market at Sukawati (7km) is a very popular shopping destination for Bali souvenirs and the Bali Safari and Marine Park, just 7km down the road, is a good whole day out for the kids, with tram rides and a small water park. There is a 9-hole golf course at the Bali Beach Hotel in Sanur. Diving can be arranged in Sanur and horse riding is just up the road.

ROverallComments.p:
We really enjoyed Villa Nataraja (and its adjacent twin Villa Raj); it had a very intimate friendly ambiance and exuded a warm, comfortable, lived in feel. Although the villa is not old, and is very well maintained, we found, on our recent re-visit, that it had lost some of its former lustre and was beginning to look a bit tired. This isn’t really anyone’s fault; it’s just that being so close to the beach means constant upgrading and maintenance. For instance, we wondered why the TVs in the bedrooms hadn’t been upgraded with flat-screen models and the manager explained that the new models they bought were affected by the sea air and keep going wrong, whereas the older style TVs proved to be more reliable!
The villa is particularly suitable people looking for get-away-from-it-all peace and quiet and is some distance from restaurants and nightlife. However, the staff are very professional indeed and the food that comes out of the kitchen is excellent, so there's little need to go out. The walled garden is very private and dominated by a great pool; the outside options (two balés and the sun loungers) were really pleasant, and being able to enjoy a jacuzzi in your own lounge has a certain seductive appeal. It’s good to have the beach nearby, and the beach-side sundeck is handy for keeping an eye on the kids. The rooms in the villa are well kitted out with huge beds and bathrooms. If you are looking for a small step up, consider paying a bit extra for Villa Maya, Majapahit’s absolute beachfront rental property.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: There were a few little surprises, like the rather dated TVs and stereo system, but nothing which would stop you enjoying the villa. Do remember the sand on the beach is black – it absorbs the suns heat so can be painfully hot in the middle of the day. The kitchen is pretty basic but as you are really unlikely to ever use it, it should not worry you – certainly the food which it produces was excellent. Do note the master bedroom is accessed by ‘floating’ stairs which would be totally unsuitable for young children.

RHighlight.p: No doubt the privacy is a highlight here. You could lock yourself away in your garden and forget the rest of the world. The staff will come and go as required – a small bell is available to summon them. The huge living room opening out to the lawns is also a plus, and having the pool inside the living room is very novel!

RSurroundArea.p: There is relatively little to disturb you in the area immediately surrounding Majapahit Villas. It is staggeringly peaceful – perfect for those looking for rest and recuperation away from the action. The closest town, Sanur, is 13km away, but it’s good for restaurants and shopping, as is Ubud (17km). Ketewel itself is a quiet village offering little to drag you away from your daybed watching the surf. Unless you’re a surfer yourself that is! This stretch of beach is well known as a surfer’s heaven (especially in East Coast season, which runs from round about November to May, when the winds turn offshore on this side of the island), but beginners should be aware of strong, swirling currents. Alternatively, guests can charter the villas' private boat for a fishing, sightseeing or snorkelling trip, or a romantic sunset cruise, or make use of one of Majapahit’s bicycles to cycle around the local ‘burb, communing with locals and, with any luck, witnessing a ceremony or two at the local temple. The market at Sukawati (7km) is a very popular shopping destination for Bali souvenirs and the Bali Safari and Marine Park, just 7km down the road, is a good whole day out for the kids, with tram rides and a small water park. There is a 9-hole golf course at the Bali Beach Hotel in Sanur. Diving can be arranged in Sanur and horse riding is just up the road.

ROverallComments.p: We really enjoyed Villa Raj (and its adjacent twin Villa Nataraja); it had a very intimate friendly ambiance and exuded a warm, comfortable, lived in feel. Although the villa is not old, and is very well maintained, we found, on our recent re-visit, that it had lost some of its former lustre and was beginning to look a bit tired. This isn’t really anyone’s fault; it’s just that being so close to the beach means constant upgrading and maintenance. For instance, we wondered why the TVs in the bedrooms hadn’t been upgraded with flat-screen models and the manager explained that the new models they bought were affected by the sea air and keep going wrong, whereas the older style TVs proved to be more reliable!

The villa is particularly suitable people looking for get-away-from-it-all peace and quiet and is some distance from restaurants and nightlife. However, the staff are very professional indeed and the food that comes out of the kitchen is excellent, so there's little need to go out. The walled garden is very private and dominated by a great pool; the outside options (two balés and the sun loungers) were really pleasant, and being able to enjoy a jacuzzi in your own lounge has a certain seductive appeal. It’s good to have the beach nearby, and the beach-side sundeck is handy for keeping an eye on the kids. The rooms in the villa are well kitted out with huge beds and bathrooms. If you are looking for a small step up, consider paying a bit extra for Villa Maya, Majapahit’s absolute beachfront rental property.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: There were a few little surprises, like the rather dated TVs and stereo system, but nothing which would stop you enjoying the villa. Do remember the sand on the beach is black – it absorbs the suns heat so can be painfully hot in the middle of the day. The kitchen is pretty basic but as you are really unlikely to ever use it, it should not worry you – certainly the food which it produces was excellent. Do note the master bedroom is accessed by ‘floating’ stairs which could be hazardous for young children.

REVIEW.Name: Lisa Spillane
REVIEW.ROverallComments: this villa is beautifully presented. the staff are simply amazing!! our stay was fantastic!

REVIEW.Name: Kelli Miranda
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved this house, had a great time. Staff was delightful. Management team really took care of us.

REVIEW.Name: Biren Patel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed at the nataraj villa and found it the best place to have a break with family. The sea shore is not that attractive for swim or bath but villa's environment is good with excellent butler "gushti" and very co-operative managers and car drivers to take you from ubud to denpasar with smiling face.

REVIEW.Name: Sarah Pangkey
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed for 9 days 8 nights at the Raj /Majapahit Beach Villas... and we loved the whole house as if it were our own. It was not hard to settle in, everything we needed on any minute of the day were catered for and attended so meticulously. The service by the villa manager and in-house staff was consistently great and always with a great smile and professionalism. I always had a pre-conception that food at these villas would be average, but this stay certainly proved me wrong! Every food we ordered was great from breakfast to lunch and dinners. As we were a bunch of exhausted tourists who never had time to clean up after our mess, the villa was always maintained very well and cleaned after every shower we take, bed made up after the afternoon naps etc. Everything is taken care of from our arrival to our departure...., worry-free! Thumbs up for Majapahit Beach Villas and the whole staff! We miss you!!! Special regards to Mbak Ilu who has been such a darling throughout our stay, she has made our stay so comfortable and it was nice to see her smile everyday!

REVIEW.Name: Claire Wellbeloved
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa was lovely and the staff were so welcoming and accommodating, it was very hard to leave!

REVIEW.Name: Terje Bergskaas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is an excellent Villa for 2 families. Our buttler Gusti and rest of the staff gave us an outstanding service.

REVIEW.Name: Thomas W Albrecht
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was an amazing vacation experience! The staff took special care of us from the moment we entered the front door. We highly recommend the villa & look forward to our next visit.

REVIEW.Name: Carrie Braman
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our vacation at Majapahit Villas was absolutely excellent and we simply cannot say enough good things! We sought a place to just relax and unwind and Villa Raj allowed us to do just that. The staff was attentive, friendly and top-notch. We will definitely recommend Majapahit to our friends!

REVIEW.Name: Kris Zawisza
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Enjoyed our stay very much. Villa was very comforatble and staff made the whole experience very realaxing a pleasurable. Highly recommendable.

REVIEW.Name: Kerry Marais
REVIEW.ROverallComments: No photo could capture the peacefulness and beauty of Mahajapit Villas. The villa itself is beautiful and tranquil with thought having been put into every aspect. The staff are the real gems: warm, happy, courteous and very diserning. It is also well located on the east close, close enough to the busier south, but giving very easy access to Ubud and the north. The only problem is that, with the villa and gardens being so beautiful, we did not have much interest in doing sight-seeing and were perfectly happy to just relax and enjoy Mahajapit. Our only criticism, which we brought up to mangement so hope it is being addressed, is the state of the overlooking beach. Bali has a problem with plastic pollution and, although Mahajapit employs a lady to clean the beach, it was in no way adequate when we were there. If they address the plastic problem on their beach, Mahajapit would be a perfect place to go to in Bali as it is just beautiful in so many ways.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding Butler Bali Wedding Butler
REVIEW.ROverallComments: One of the greatest weeks of our lifes, the villas and staff are amazing. Majapahit is an oasis away from the hustle and bustle of the tourist hot spots but with in easy reach for any day trips. We stayed with our extended families and noone wished to ever leave. We definitely would love to stay there again one day!

REVIEW.Name: ellen lowenthal
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We really enjoyed our stay at the villa. We loved how clean and well kept it was! It was so relaxing and the staff , especially our butler Dawa, were all very accommodating and helped to make our stay there extra special.

REVIEW.Name: Tong Keong Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very friendly, helpful and attentive staff. We very much enjoying and feel comfortable with our stay there.

REVIEW.Name: Elang Rajawali Travel Elang Rajawali Travel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a great time at the villa. The villa was the perfect place for our family vacation. The staff were most helpful. The only thing that concern us was the kitchen area that really need some more ventilation. Other than that, it was perfect.

REVIEW.Name: Klan Yayincilik ve Reklamcilik Ltd Sti ( brainworks) Klan Yayincilik ve Reklamcilik Ltd Sti ( brainworks)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Extremely happy with the villa and the staff. A to Z, it was an amazing experience. Villa Manager was GREAT. Thank you very much for all.

REVIEW.Name: DR KHALID ALJABRI
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Mercy

REVIEW.Name: Angelo Mele
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a great experience. The staff and the villa were fabulous. A specially thanks go to Wayan.

REVIEW.Name: Jon Stonham
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The staff absolutely make this villa. Superb service. Lovely location we went snorkeling, visited the Marine Safari and managed a trip to the local markets. Lot more peaceful than Kuta and Seminyak - laid back and charming. Food at the villa was great - we ate exclusively Indonesian which was excellent. Recommended

REVIEW.Name: Brodie Warren
REVIEW.ROverallComments: 12 of us stayed in Villas Raj and Nataraja, and we all had a wonderful time, inculding the children. The pool and outdoor areas are beautiful and we were able to relax and enjoy the weather, the company, the food and beverages, and most of all the peace and quiet. Your staff are all extremely friendly and helpful, and all did their jobs well without exception. Iluh, Wayan, and Ketut were the friendly folk who looked after us daily, but the cleaners, drivers, cooks and beauticians/spa staff all did a wonderful (often behind the scenes) job as well - thankyou to all for making our stay so easy!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding International, PT Bali Wedding International, PT
Kate Silvers
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful trip - everything we needed was catered for by Gus, our amazing butler. We truly enjoyed the surroudings and the villa itself and would retrun in a heartbeat!

REVIEW.Name: Richard Villarin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We are absolutely in-love with our butler, Iluh! We want to take her home!

REVIEW.Name: Taryn Sharples
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
Bedrooms and bathrooms are amazing. Wonderful staff couldnt do enough for us. Indoor living areas a little small but perfect for us because you'd rather be outside usually!
Great value for money

REVIEW.Name: Laurence Catherine Hill
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved this villa. It is peaceful, beautiful and within driving distance of many activities, including Bali Safari, diving, Sanur beach. The staff was amazing, they make sure you have everything you need and relax during your stay.

REVIEW.Name: Stephen Porteous
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Actually a great area to stay as the people were more genuine than in the more tourist orientated areas. Staff were awesome and Dewa was a great help during our stay and we left considering him as a friend. Management was very helpful. Villas were absolute luxury and well worth the money. Wish we stayed there for our whole time in Bali.

REVIEW.Name: KeithAnn Wood
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We were a party of four. We could not have been MORE pleased with our stay at the Raj. We were completely taken care of by the staff. Dewa was always there for us and so accommodating and knowledgeable. We wanted for NOTHING! From our arrival to our departure we were catered to. The spa staff was spectacular as we used them just about on a daily basis. Our villa was always kept neat and the grounds were always kept tidy. The driver that was hired for us was just as wonderful. Toya was so great and always there for us as we used him just about every day of our 9 days. Every day we were greeted by the staff and Dewa when we returned from our "activity" as they say. We were blessed enough to be able to have Dewa join us to several of our activities and he answered all of our questions with such patience. He became more of a travel companion than someone who was hired to work for us. The food was always FABULOUS and perfect. We were recommended to the Villas from a friend and we would not hesitate to recommend them to everyone! We wish it was closer to Alabama (USA) as the flight is the only part we didn't like! We want to plan another vacation to Majapahit and the Villa Raj. This was the VACATION OF A LIFETIME!

REVIEW.Name: Sally Richards
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our family had an amazing time here! The villa is beautiful and the staff extremely friendly and attentive. No request was too small and they were especially fantastic with our children - this is an ideal place to stay as a family. We recommend Majapahit to everyone!

REVIEW.Name: Charter Voyages SA / CB Travel Services Charter Voyages SA / CB Travel Services
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
We spent one week in villa Maya Majapahit. The Villa Maya and the Joglo are beautiful and well maintained. You are never sure when you see pictures on a WEB site that the accommodations will look the same... it was exactly like we were hoping. All the living Areas were extremely clean and everything was just perfect. We were 2 families (5 adults and 3 children's) and everybody enjoyed staying at the Majapahit villas.
Our Butler (DEWA) was just exceptional!!! He was always available, almost anticipating our needs and extremely helpful. He helped us to prepare the different trips we wanted to do. Our kids loved him so much, they are asking when we will see him again :-) And to finish, the food was so good that even if we planned to have some dinners outside, we spend every single night at the villa, enjoying the delicious meals.

REVIEW.Name: Bethell Pauline
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa was superb and it suited our group of 5 adults perfectly. Location is quite remote but availability of car/driver or taxis was so easy and cheap that this was not an issue. The beach is not a swimming beach - but great for walks in the early evening when you can experience real Bali life, watching the local children playing football or the men fishing. Staff were faultless - always available and helpful. We had an amazing stay and really cannot fault it at all.

REVIEW.Name: Albena Delcheva
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic place. One of the very best I've stayed at in Bali. Close drive to Ubud, very nice location. The beach however is not to be used but regardless the place is stunning. Butler was amazing. Superior service. Villa decoration was amazing.

REVIEW.Name: Hussam Bakhsh
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa got what you need for fabulous vacation Staff were helpful and highly recommended to stay there and enjoy their hospitality

REVIEW.Name: Hugo van Vledder
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic house, we absolutely loved it. Very nice style with a lot of privacy. Excellent service. Choice, presentation and quality of food was (premium) restaurant quality. Would not recommend it if you look for an active nightlife but if you look for relaxing days in a gorgeous atmosphere, you will love this place.

REVIEW.Name: Marco Borlongan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa is perfect. Unpretentious, just like home atmosphere. We enjoyed our stay in the peaceful environment of Villa Maya. If you are looking for a real vacation, away from it all, with a view of the sea every single moment, then this is the place.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding Butler Bali Wedding Butler
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Ketut, Dewa, Ari and the entire beautifull staff at Majapahit Villas. Your helpfulness and professionalism has made our family had a wonderful experience. We will always remember this place with fondness because of you and your work. Thank you for the yummy breakfast and dinner, the clean towel, the ever present smile! and when we missed our flight home, you worried with us and stood by us and helped as much as you could. We so very grateful to you. We hope Majapahit continues to succeed and thrive because you are simply wonderful.

REVIEW.Name: Jane Needham
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
We had a wonderful eight days at Majapahit Villas. We stayed in Villa Maya and enjoyed the beautiful ocean views, the gorgeous architecture, the amazing pool, and of course the food and service. The staff are simply wonderful and nothing was too much trouble. It was a shock to come home and find that things did not magically appear when I needed them!
The children were particularly spoiled by Dewa (our butler) and Bagus (our driver), and we were given a lot of information about everyday daily life in Indonesia (including some local village girls coming to the villa to give us and some guests a welcome dance).
Every aspect of our trip was wonderful. Bagus knows the good restaurants everywhere we went, and Dewa always had everything ready for us when we got home.
A completely relaxing holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Simone Rupp
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Nataraja was a small piece of heaven. Everything was outstanding from the views to the food and especially the staff! Our butler Iluh was just amazing and no request was too big or too small. We really enjoyed out stay and we cannot wait to return!

REVIEW.Name: Total Bali Total Bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We come here to stay for a wedding and had the best experience! The villa was amazing and our lovely host ilu made sure we were well, looked after and happy. We will definitely be back!! Thank you so much for such a wonderful experience . It was the best.

REVIEW.Name: Nickole Yap
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We literally didn't have to leave the villa. Meals, pool, beach, massage, mani/pedi were all aval within the comfort of the villa (or within walking distance). Felt really pampered by the staff there. Dewa our villa butler was the best! The villa provided after-sun lotion and insect repellent spray which I tot was a nice touch

REVIEW.Name: Ka Man Chan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Stayed in Villa Raj for five days, the trip was excellent! Nice and clean villa and pool, and with cheering and helpful staff. That was my parents' anniversary, the cake and flower they prepared for us was just great! Although the villa is not close to major tourist spots, we were in Bali for relaxing. The quiet location just provide us a escape from crowds. Driver service could bring you anywhere whenever you want. Highly appreciate our driver as well for his great service! One more point to add. I thought I lost my necklace inside the villa and all the staff spent their greatest effort in helping me. I was so impressed and it was great that eventually we could find it. Hope to stay in the same villa in future! Highly recommended!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding International, PT Bali Wedding International, PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a beautiful stay. You all have made my daughters wedding stay and the ceremony so memorable. We have loved our stay and the service was the best I have experienced. Thank you all for your cooperation, consideration, care and love. The way you looked after the children and guests was so amazing. Wayan, Ari and Dewa are incredible people with skill to make sure we wanted for nothing. Please take care and I wish you all as much happiness as you have given us.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding International, PT Bali Wedding International, PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved the villa! Very private and amazing service. We were very comfortable and could ask for anything (food, taxi, towels) knowing it couldn't be far away! We had the most amazing visit time in Bali!! We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Maggie Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This place is amazing and the staff are absolutely wonderful. They have made our stay extremely hard to walk away from. Our wedding was so special and the whole stay was amazing. You were all so kind to us and made this holiday the best we've ever had! We hope to be back one day. Thank you Ketut, Dewa and everyone.

REVIEW.Name: Kate O'Neill
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful villa completely removed from the hustle & bustle but within a 10 minute drive of Sunar. But why leave. Thoroughly relaxing stay. Great staff, extensive and great quality food and beverage menu. Would love to stay again

REVIEW.Name: Maggie Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing! Thank you, especially to Iluh, Dewa, Wayan & Ketut for your sincere & friendly service. You made us feel at home, relaxed and very well fed. We hope to be back one day soon. Beautiful villa, clean & comfortable.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Seasons Tours and Travel / We Shout / VIP entourge
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent accommodation, excellent food, excellent service, excellent staff. Thank you for making our stay one to remember and to talk about for along time to come. Your staff are friendly and attentive to every detail and are a credit to you. One day will come back to stay with you again. Highly Recommended. Five stars for you guys.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Seasons Tours and Travel / We Shout / VIP entourge
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a truly wonderful stay here, definitely the best place we've stayed in Bali. The staff were very attentive and helpful. The view and food were both equally amazing. We will definitely try to stay here again.

REVIEW.Name: Opulence in Travel Opulence in Travel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: So each and everyone from Majapahit Beach Villas, we thank you for making our stay so unforgettable. This is our wedding we will never forget. The management, cooks, house keeper (so clean), ground keeper, taxi driver and massage were amazing, happy, helpful and always ready to please. you all have special people working here and make any guest not wanting their holiday to end. Hopefully some other year to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Total Bali Total Bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wayan, Dewa, Bagus & Ketut Thank you. A truly wonderful experience, outstanding service & attention to detail. A great way to celebrate a big birthday.

REVIEW.Name: Total Bali Total Bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks to all the staff at the villa, we had an amazing few days. Beautiful and relaxing scenery and great service.

REVIEW.Name: Christopher Tan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent hospitality and yummy food. We enjoyed our stay with the wonderful staff at Majapahit.

REVIEW.Name: Carla Sy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for a wonderful stay in your truly special villa. I loved being able to swim in the pool and enjoy the sea view. The wedding of Greg & Carla was made ever more of a memorable occasion by the transformation of the beautiful setting into a fairy tale wedding venue. So many happy memories at Bali and the wonderful, courteous, helpful, smiling staff here at Majapahit. Many Thanks

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding Helper Bali Wedding Helper
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I and my fiance had a wedding here in Bali. It was the first time to Indonesia, and we had a wonderful moment in Bali. Service and food at this Villa was so nice. I'll remember here as the place we marry.
REVIEW.ReviewByName: Joonhyeon Kim and S, South Korea

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful, relaxing holiday. The gardens and view of the ocean is superb here. Wayan made us feel most welcome and at home. He is always smiling and a lovely person to talk to. Excellent English. Thank Wayan for the endless coffees & cocktail you have made us! we would like to take you home! Majapahit villas are lucky to have you here. Thanks to Dewa for the excellent food. Your banquet for our friends was fabulous!. Dewa is always kind and smiling and lovely to talk to. Bagus helped us to find a doctor when our daughter was sick and he was very kind and patient. Both massage girl were fantastic! The best we're had in Bali!. We will remember you all and hope to see you again.

REVIEW.Name: Total Bali Total Bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an incredible stay with my nearest and dearest friends for my 50th. The villa was an oasis with attentive and friendly staff. Ari our butler made our experience easy and very relaxing. Our dinner experience were amazing. Thanks to all at Majapahit.

REVIEW.Name: Karly West
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our second time staying at the Majapahit and the staff, villa, and pool are absolutely amazing. The staff are extremely helpful, kind, and the chef makes the most delicious food. It is located in a quiet fishing village but still a close drive to many attractions. We highly recommend this villa.

REVIEW.Name: Meegan Stewart
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic place, staff are excellent, friendly & beautiful people. We had such an awesome time here and will definitely visit again. Thank you to the staff especially Wayan.

REVIEW.Name: Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: All of my family member enjoy to stay in Majapahit Villas. It has nice view for the ocean, and it make us feel like at home, we feel very relax to stay here. For the food here we all like the meal you prepare for us, especially the BBQ dinner. The staff in this villa are very friendly and take care of us like a family member. Thank you

REVIEW.Name: Stephan Lowy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Many thanks to Wayan for making our stay at Villa Raj relaxing and enjoyable. Also thank you to Dewa for being so flexible with the Menu allowing us to create our own meals.

REVIEW.Name: Andrew Beattie
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Wayan & Co! We had a fabulous stay, really relaxed. A real home away from home.

REVIEW.Name: Villa Novo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Nice, nice and nice. This place is wonderful and the staff is exceptional. We never heard ''it's not possible''. Thanks a lot it was the best holidays that we had since a long time.

REVIEW.Name: Pierangelo PARMA
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very nice villa, very quiet, the sea is normally windy and raft, you sleep with his sound . The service is very good , the staff is professional, superb and attentive. The food is very good and you will not miss the outside restaurants. The butler Dewa is a real one, all of us have appreciate his professionalism. Is a place for a relaxing moment away from the normal Bali tourist frenzy of today.

REVIEW.Name: JUDITH BUKOWSKI
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for always making me feel at home! Over the past few years, you guys have softened my heart and showed me the true beauty and meaning of life. Through you guys characteristic and kind service, each one of you exemplifies the person i strive to become. Villa Majapahit will always be my favorite place in Bali. Thank you for all the smiles, laughs, fun memories, good food and long massages. I will miss it all, but i promise I'll be back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Penny Chu
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great ambience, great view and attentive staff. We really enjoy our trip here. Will definitely come back again next time visiting Bali.

REVIEW.Name: Simanti Talukdar
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It's was a wonderful experience & we really enjoyed our stay here. Many nice view & ambience & friendly staff. Excellent service & very relaxing.

REVIEW.Name: Johnny Heng
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a great time staying at Majapahit Villas. We were made to feel very much at home, all thanks to the excellent service of Dewa who made sure all our needs are catered for. This is a great place to be in if one has nothing to do and simply stay at the villa. Thank you very much Dewa and crew. See you again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Hemen Patel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I have traveled almost the world but this place amazing!!! I would like to come and enjoy it again. Ocean facing villa Maya is my dream places now. You can write, think, paint and meditate here. I love you Bali people, you are so humble and good. God bless you all. I would surely recommend Bali and Majapahit to my friends.

REVIEW.Name: Jorik Dozy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wow......! That is really the one word that comes up! The staff was amazing, the place is beautiful. Thank you so much. The best villa in Bali.

REVIEW.Name: Beijing Zanadu International Travel Serv Co. Ltd.-Shanghai
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our butler is the best. Wish we could have drink with him again. The villa is so nice and comfortable. Maybe next time will bring our children to come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Sadiq Das
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful time at the villa. your staff are very kind and hospitable. you took very good care at our family and made our stay very pleasant and enjoyable. We will surely stay here again when we visit Bali next time and recommend you to all our friends and family.

REVIEW.Name: Aaron .
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for our stay. This place is great with wonderful service and pool.

REVIEW.Name: Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Really friendly staffs and beautiful environment!! Definitely want to come back. Hope to be here soon. See you guys next time.

REVIEW.Name: Villalet Pty Ltd Villalet Pty Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the most amazing holiday! Your staff have made our stay incredible. So accommodating. We will recommend this place to everyone.

REVIEW.Name: Villalet Pty Ltd Villalet Pty Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had such a wonderful time. The villa is amazing, beautiful and everything you would expect from a Bali Villa. The staff have all been wonderful, friendly and want to help as much as they can. Iluh has been an exceptional maid, tending to our every need, helping our grandmother and our son be as comfortable as possible always with a smile on her face. We will be back again. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Good Living Asia / Honey combers Good Living Asia / Honey combers
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lovely and quiet here at Majapahit. Love the pool and Dewa was brilliant. Thank you for having us!

REVIEW.Name: Lily Zhang
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It's really a fantastic journey for me and my pals.We love the villa and the staff so much. Iluh and Ketut help us a lot during our stay. Thank you all and we will recommend this amazing place to my friends.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villas Cantik
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a very relaxing and enjoyable holiday, especially to Dewa and his team and their attention to detail that ensured our week here was unforgettable. Dewa went out of his way, including floral arrangements and local dancers to ensure that our 20th anniversary was a special occasion. Majapahit exceeded all of our expectations and we look forward to returning.

REVIEW.Name: Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very happy in such a beautiful place to live for four nights, and your service is very good, everyone is full of smile. We love you, and i hope next time have the opportunity to live in this. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Sense
REVIEW.ROverallComments: From first day we got here every staff is very warm. Let us have a feeling like home!

REVIEW.Name: BELLAVISTA DEMEURES DE CHARME
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a great stay at Villa Majapahit. Dewa took so much care of us, organizing our days, visits and making it magical and unforgettable. The food was delicious and massages extremely relaxing, thanks to magic hands. It's hard to leave the Villa and our new friends, but we will come back next time we fly to Bali. Thank you Dewa and thank you the team.

REVIEW.Name: Paul Steel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fabulous relaxing stay in this modern , open plan luxury Villa where the staff couldn't do enough to make us feel at home . As there is not much to walk to this Villa is ideal for those wanting to simply Chillax, swim, read , and eat excellent food at very reasonable prices provided by an excellent inhouse chef.Our Canadian friends also loved their introduction to Bali Villa lifestyle. Great beachfront location meant cooling sea breezes and fantastic pool. Wifi and TV also good. Top marks to our caring smiling butler Wayan for his discreet and ever watchful service ( He's the man when it comes to prechilled beer glasses:>)....We loved it ! Terimah Kasih to all...we look forward to returning Warmest regards Sheree, Celine, Jan and Paul

REVIEW.Name: Jain Ankish S
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Crazy place....awesome service.

REVIEW.Name: Shenzhen YesVilla Network Technology Co., LIMITED
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Service very good, environment very good and the food very good

REVIEW.Name: Flight Centre Galleria
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A place that felt like home in a tranquil setting "Bali Paradise". Never felt so relaxed! Wonderful service from all staff. Thank you for your smiles, laughter and welcome hospitality. Wishing you and your families happiness. A wonderful week. I will be back

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Sense
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have such a beautiful holiday. The staff is very nice. We feel like home. The food is yummy! I hope to see you again on next holiday. I'm very enjoy in this place. Thanks for your service

REVIEW.Name: Tony Fong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for your hospitality and service during our stay here! Thank you for catering to our needs and providing us with wonderful, delicious meals. Thank you for always making the place clean and neat despite us being messy. Most importantly, thank you for making us feel at home here! Thank you for always greeting us with your warm friendly smiles and greetings throughout the day. The past 4 days has been magical. Thanks to all the staff here. We hope to come back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Samantha Thiel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an amazing few days at Villa Maya. Bali has felt like such magical place and you all are an important piece of that. Excellence food, beautiful space, friendly service and so attentive what did we not have?! This trip will for ever be a great memory and hope to be back with you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Christoph Pestinger
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa is so amazing! All the lovely decoration and pictures. We had a very nice and beautiful time. The massages, the food, the drink, the trips, the pool, the interior and the garden - absolutely fantastic! Thanks to the staff to iluh, to Bagus and to the manager! Everything so kind and sweet with a big smile. We will come back.

REVIEW.Name: Ackermann Sylvie
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a wonderful time, we had at Majapahit. We enjoyed a very second. Many thanks to the staff and Dewa. We hope we see you again!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for the wonderful time we had here. The villa was great and the staff was catering for every need we had. Thank you, looking forward to coming back.

REVIEW.Name: Huffman Travel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Many thanks for a wonderful week in Bali! We enjoyed every minute of our time here. Every member of the staff here went out of their way to make certain that all of our needs were met. We were well cared for. A special thank you for your birthday gift. The dancers were wonderful. We hope to return soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Je t'aime
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks a lot for your warm welcome. Food was great as well as massage & pedicure. We will come back for sure. What a great place and a great kind of service. We really enjoyed our stay in Bali. Wayan is such a great butler. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Peter White
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to Ketut, Wayan and staff for a very relaxing stay at Villa Maya. The service was great and catered to our every need. I particularly enjoyed waking up in the morning and seeing the waves breaking over the reef. Thanks again.

REVIEW.Name: Peeyush Mr.
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Its tough to compare the experience of staying at Majapahit Beach Villas with our previous experience at hotel. First: the service is absolutely the best in class. Second: the villa, we enjoyed swimming every day. the kids loved Bali more this time. Finally the seamless service from airport pick up to drop of overall led to a fantastic stay. Will come again.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Je t'aime
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A very nice villa with a great swimming pool. the service is extraordinary and the food is excellent. We enjoy the few days spent here and we look forward to see you again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an amazing time staying at the villa. Iluh & the staff were very accommodating. Thank you for an amazing holiday. It was the perfect place for a family holiday with our 3 sons, and one wife and 2 girlfriends and our 16 month old grandson, Eddie. Iluh and the staff spoilt us with their constant attention. It is hard to leave this paradise.

REVIEW.Name: Rachael Trainor
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for assistance us during our amazing holidays in Bali. You all were very helpful, friendly and caring. The food was a highlight! This villa and experience will be in our heart forever. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: MILLIONAIRE WUHU
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We all had a wonderful holiday here. and the staff is very kind and nice. View from here is so beautiful. The service in here is so good, thanks all staff here. We all hope come again next time.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the staff who have made our stay at Majapahit Maya Villa amazing. It is a stunning property. A special thank you to Ari for her amazing attention and caring for all our needs. We also love her smile it brightened up even the most overcast day. Thank you for the memories.

REVIEW.Name: Duke Technology Co. Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank for all staff here. Everything is perfect and we really feel like warm home.

REVIEW.Name: Sky High Agency (partnering with Bali Exotic Wedding)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Its a great stay and wonderful service. Thank you and we will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Claire Liu
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was an amazing stay with friends to celebrate our wedding. The staff here were so friendly and helpful to us. Thank you for having us and providing the most unforgettable experience in Bali. Hope to see you guys soon.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Sense
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It's a wonderful place, everything is perfect. I will be back & all will be back.

REVIEW.Name: LATEFAH ALHOMOUD
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Everything more than good, service and villa and reception.

REVIEW.Name: Sarah Kee
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Kiril & I were married in Villa Maya. From the moment we arrived the staff made us feel so welcome. Our stay has been magical & we would happily come back again. Ketut, Dewa & team thank you for taking care of us, our bridal group, family & friends. PS : Service, food & housekeeping was perfect!

REVIEW.Name: Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great accommodation experience, good team and friendly attitude. Thank you so much,

REVIEW.Name: Sky High Agency (partnering with Bali Exotic Wedding)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A very pleasant stay. The swimming pool was great. The service in the villa was attentive & warm. Food was tasty especially the Beef Rendang. Wonderful stay with the perfect slice of paradise.

REVIEW.Name: Villa Getaways, Ltd.
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the perfect stay at the perfect villa here. Especially to Wayan!

REVIEW.Name: Ann Geehnan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a fabulous time!!! Wayan is amazing, great personalized service. The BBQ each evening were tasty and plentiful. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Agoda - ID
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Really appreciate your appropriate arrangement, it was a perfect holiday. We had a great dinner and breakfast here. It's very clean and tidy. We live very comfortable. Thank you for the staff here.

REVIEW.Name: MILLIONAIRE WUHU
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We're glad to stay here and enjoy the whole journey. The villa, warm and comfortable, spacious and bright, clean, the new fashion experiencing newly this type of accommodation. People here are helpful and kind in our daily life. The food they cooked are delicious. We enjoy it very much. Thank you for the memories.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Reservation Surprise Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderfull time here and Lluh & Dewa gave us the greatest service. Love them so much we don't want to leave. It's like home in Bali, we are looking forward to come back. Thank you so so so much.

REVIEW.Name: Shaun James
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for your kind welcome & hospitality. We have enjoyed our to short time here . We will miss the beautiful villa and delicious food. We will visit again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Fu Tat Yuen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very pleasant stay, nice villa and also very helpful staff. the food and service is perfect here. Thanks Ketut, Wayan and all staff here.

REVIEW.Name: MILLIONAIRE WUHU
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for your care. We like it very much. The cook's food is delicious. We like the great pool villa, we stayed here for three nights and we have a good sleep. This is a wonderful holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Huei Chuan Wen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Butler Dewa & Ari have been of great help to make our seventh stay in Bali an insightful cultural tour.

REVIEW.Name: Beijing Zanadu International Travel Serv Co. Ltd.-Shanghai
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Unforgettable stay. Feels like at home. Thank you so much, I'll be back.

REVIEW.Name: Nari Jeong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Everything is excellent, we thank you to everyone for all kindness. Especially thanks to our butler Wayan and manager Ketut & chef Dewa. We had a wonderful wedding. Thanks to all of you.

REVIEW.Name: Zendy Pranata
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We all have wonderful holiday at here. Good atmosphere, good hospitality and all good.

REVIEW.Name: Lay Har Yeo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Ketut, Dewa, Iluh, Wayan and the staff @ Majapahit. You have made our stay here a thoroughly enjoyable one. Thank you for organizing a fun and great BBQ. Thank you for advising us the various tours and stuff. We hope we can be back here again...

REVIEW.Name: Doris K
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have our dream wedding in Majapahit Beach Villas. The view is perfect, the villa is great and everyone at the party so enjoyed. The crew in villa is excellent, professional, response quick every single time that we need help. They are also considerate and provide a lot good recommendation for us to enjoy our stay. The Spa is great!!!! Our perfect memory in Bali is Majapahit.

REVIEW.Name: Doris K
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The service is excellent and the staff are very nice and patient. We had a lot of good memory here and we wish to come again one day! Thank you!

REVIEW.Name: Lay Har Yeo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an amazing experience! The villa really is so beautiful, and the view and location is truly to die for!!! Also, thank you for being so helpful throughout our stay. Can't wait to be back!!!

REVIEW.Name: Lay Har Yeo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing! Awesome service! We have such a wonderful time at your villa, nice view, room, bed and friendly crew. We don't want to leave here! Hope can come back again!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an incredible time. We have enjoyed it tremendously. The villa is very beautiful and the staff is very nice and caring.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a great vacation at Villa Maya. It was special to hear the sound of the sea the entire time. The children had great fun swimming and walking on the beach. We have very good memories of the stay.

REVIEW.Name: Andy Grant
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for everything! It was great holiday! Friendly and good staff. Quiet and calm place with ocean view. We want to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Laura Barnsley
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks very much for the great service and fantastic holiday. We all had a great time, and appreciate Dewa and the rest of the awesome staff.

REVIEW.Name: John Kodjayan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you!! We love here and enjoy here very much. We will come back again here. Thank you again!!

REVIEW.Name: Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It's a nice place. It was a really amazing vacation here. People are great & food is nice, we loved the time spent here. Thank you so much for your kind help and taking car our staying here. You are wonderful.

REVIEW.Name: Angelina Ms
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for everything you've provided to us from food preparation, transportation booking, service booking and the travel advice you provided during our 6 days stay. We feel at home. Special thanks to Ketut, Dewa, Wayan and Bagus who have helped us in person to make our stay feel at home.

REVIEW.Name: Angelina Ms
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very very very thanks!!! This villas housekeeper, cooks, driver here are very friendly and dedicated my kids like it very much. Hope to open another time come to Bali, so we can come here next year. Thanks everybody in this beach villas. We must be tell our friends to come here.

REVIEW.Name: Amy Kim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I had a really happy wedding here. Thank you for everything.

REVIEW.Name: Shenzhen YesVilla Network Technology Co., LIMITED
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks, we like here, both my daughter and me. The feeling is wonderful, the swimming pool is good. Everyday we swim. The food is also good.

REVIEW.Name: MILLIONAIRE WUHU
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Sampai dengan hari ini, the sunshine, swimming pool, everything very beautiful. Listening to the sound of wave, our mind was very calm. Semoga tamu tamu berikutnya bisa menikmati semua yg ada disini. We had a great atay.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing holiday we have had here. a beautiful setting with the most wonderful staff. Nothing is ever to much for them. They go above and beyond! You have made our 2016 get together very special. Thank you once again.

REVIEW.Name: Can Tran
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This location is so beautiful & the staff friendly. This was a magical time during our time in Bali. Special thanks to Ketut, Iluh, Wayan, Rida & all the lovely people who helped make this such an amazing and memorable experience. Thank you for the flower ring, thank you for helping us make our honeymoon complete. Thank you for being such wonderful people.

REVIEW.Name: Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a pleasant time in this villas, but most important is the staff here, they treat us like a family, make us feel like home. but also we know, at the same time we feel comfortable, it is you, the people here offer us the most kind of service, so we will like to thank you for everything you have done. Hope we can meet again.

REVIEW.Name: Ros Daniels
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had a wonderful stay in this amazing villa. The service has been impeccable with special mention to Wayan whom has exceeded our expectation greatly. Thank you also to Dewa for the delicious food. Ketut for his managerial service. Thank you to Bagus for his travel guidance and showing us a small part of this paradise. Hoping to return one day and will be highly recommending Majapahit.

REVIEW.Name: Richard Mengko
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Terima kasih banyak atas segala atensi dan kebaikan yang telah diberikan kepada kami sekeluarga, Kami sekeluarga sangat menikmati tinggal di Majapahit Beach Villas ini selama 3 hari 2 malam. Semoga diliburan berikutnya kami bisa kesini lagi bersama keluarga besar. Sekali lagi terima kasih banyak untuk semuanya..........

REVIEW.Name: Lori Jackman
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had a lovely 2 days, so wish it could be longer! Many thanks to the wonderful staff for making our stay perfect. See you all again very soon - we hope!

REVIEW.Name: Patrik Jonsson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I would like to say a big thank you for a fantastic stay at Villa Maya! The villa is so beautiful and the staff are amazing. A special thank you to Dewa for taking so good care of us. Your service mind together with your professional approach is priceless!. Also all our spa treatment were amazing. The best treatments I ever had. Thank you Desak & Rida. The food during our week were also exceptional! thank you wayan for putting so much love into our meals. Not to forget the rest of the staff who made sure the villa and pool area was so clean and nice! We will definitely recommend this place and also hope to come back!

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Sense
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very Good. Thank you

REVIEW.Name: Karin Lind-Mörnesten
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Terima kasih for a fantastic stay and great service . We especially enjoyed the food and treatments by the pool. Location is awesome and will be hard to beat. We will surely be back soon. Highly recommend this place.

REVIEW.Name: Villa Finder
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful stay here, thanks a lot to Wayan and all the team for their help and kindness, the food was excellent. We wish to come again.

REVIEW.Name: Maryka Jacobs
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Loved our time in villa Raj! especially loved the service provided by Dewa. Dewa went above and beyond the expected standard, knowledgeable and professionalism! We will be back again.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Sense
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Everything in this wonderful villa gives my family unforgettable experience. We will come again if there was any chance to come to Bali. Thank you Wayan for the amazing and warm service. Thank you manager for the good planning made for us. Thank you driver for the guidance showing us around. Thank you every staff here.

REVIEW.Name: Julie Davis
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We thoroughly enjoyed our special piece of paradise. the villa is private, peaceful and tranquil. Amenities and service very good. Iluh was friendly and attentive to all our needs and requests and looked after us very well. Thank you very much for a wonderful visit.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Sense
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for our trip to Bali Island.everyone service attitude is so kind, very good. The environment is very quite. Best wishes.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Sense
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Good service, nice place. thank you Wayan, driver & chef. Amazing place. Terima kasih!

REVIEW.Name: Andy Chan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed at Nataraja over the weekend of 9 to 16 November 2016 and found it pretty accommodating and pleasant. Special mention must be given to Wayan who attended to all our needs while we here at the villa. He's the one that make our stay most comfortable from good to great. Thank you Wayan.

REVIEW.Name: Chris Crough
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to Dewa and all the staff at Majapahit for making our stay extremely enjoyable and relaxing. We will be back!!!
